Jesse Winton
Eyecenter Optometric • Become a Part of Our Family Campaign
This campaign will introduce the community to the story of Eycenter Optometric, through the eyes of Dr. Fred Fuerst, Dr. Palmer Lee, and others who have been a part of the Eyecenter Family.
Services
  • Film Production
purpose

the purpose of this campaign is to tell your story by exploring how eyecenter optometric has kept family values at the forefront of their business for 57 years through a series of 6 short films. broken into chapters, each chapter will demonstrate those values through specific stories relating to the history of the company throughout the years.

pricing • $3500

the cost per film includes:

  • 1 full-day of shooting
  • 3 full edits of the film as necessary
  • directorial and equipment costs.
  • production costs

Total Price $3500 per video
